item.title: Enforce Style With Vale
item.description: A style guide is a great tool to help maintain consistency in across a content collection. The only problem with the "static" style guide as a reference is getting people to read it, remember what’s in it, and actually apply it to their writing. I am very familiar with the documentation style guide at CircleCI because I wrote it! But Still I have times where I need to go and check something specific. If I can’t have that content at the end of my fingertips I can’t expect others to either.
